description: Mobile techniques used by YiSpecter, ATT&CK software S0311 v1.1
name: YiSpecter (S0311)

techniques.comment: [YiSpecter](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0311)'s malicious apps were signed with iOS enterprise certificates issued by Apple to allow the apps to be installed as enterprise apps on non-jailbroken iOS devices.(Citation: PaloAlto-YiSpecter)
